Each_item.News_content: Visa Inc (NYSE:V) announced a new partnership with a major fintech company to expand digital payment solutions globally. This move is expected to enhance Visa's market presence and drive revenue growth in emerging markets.

The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company reported a decline in Q3 earnings due to supply chain disruptions and rising raw material costs. Analysts are cautious about the company's short-term prospects but remain optimistic about long-term recovery.
